items.name: app-layout
items.title: App Layout
items.description: A comprehensive layout system with sidebar navigation, resizable panels, and organized content areas.

items.name: app-breadcrumbs
items.title: App Breadcrumbs
items.description: A breadcrumb component for the application.

items.name: app-01
items.title: App 01
items.description: An example app layout with a sidebar and a main content area.

items.name: app-layout-basic
items.title: Basic Layout
items.description: Simple layout with header and content using AppSidebar

items.name: app-layout-no-header
items.title: Layout Without Header
items.description: Minimal layout without header for cleaner interfaces

items.name: app-layout-with-actions
items.title: Layout with Header Actions
items.description: Layout using AppLayoutHeaderActions for buttons and controls

items.name: app-layout-custom-sidebar
items.title: Custom Sidebar
items.description: Layout with a custom sidebar instead of the default AppSidebar

items.name: app-layout-resizable
items.title: Resizable Panels
items.description: Layout with resizable primary and secondary panels

items.name: app-layout-collapsed
items.title: Collapsed Sidebar
items.description: Layout that starts with sidebar collapsed by default

items.name: app-breadcrumbs-home
items.title: With Home Link
items.description: Basic breadcrumbs showing Home link (default behavior)

items.name: app-breadcrumbs-no-home
items.title: Without Home Link
items.description: Breadcrumbs without the default Home link using showHome=false

items.name: app-breadcrumbs-nested
items.title: Nested Navigation
items.description: Multi-level breadcrumbs for deep navigation structures
